statements: SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE doctor_id = 5;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE record_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 100 AND doctor_id = 200;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE record_id > 5 ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT prescription_records.record_id, prescription_records.medication_name, patient_id, doctor_id FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE dosage < 50 OR dosage > 100;
SELECT doctor_id, AVG(dosage) AS average_dosage FROM prescription_records GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING AVG(dosage) > 75;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records;
SELECT patient_id, medication_id, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM medication_dosages WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT medication_name, dosage_instructions FROM medication_dosages;
SELECT MAX(dosage) FROM prescription_records;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM medication_dosages ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND dosage > 5;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 10 ORDER BY dosage DESC;

SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM prescription_records pr JOIN medication_dosages md ON pr.medication_id = md.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name HAVING total_prescriptions > 1;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE prescription_date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_details WHERE age > 50;
SELECT prescription_date, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_details WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, prescription_date, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_details WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency_per_day FROM medication_dosages WHERE frequency_per_day >= 3 ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT prescription_date, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' ORDER BY prescription_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_details WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage >= 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' OR medication_name LIKE 'Paracetamol%';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, prescription_date FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage >= 100;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM treatment_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, prescription_date, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, medication_id FROM treatment_records WHERE patient_id = 3 AND doctor_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, medication_name, medication_stock FROM treatment_records JOIN medications ON treatment_records.medication_id = medications.medication_id;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
